column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=My father is from the West Ukrainian area [ populated by ] the Hutsuls , the dwellers of the Ukrainian Carpathian Mountains .
#Text=So I was born in it .
#Text=I saw it all in my childhood .
#Text=Hutsuls have a unique culture with an ancient and rich history which inspired me to create my concept album Wild Dances .
#Text=It combines powerful and permeating ethnic drums , trumpet sounds of the trembita , an ancient Hutsul music instrument , with modern dance beats .
#Text=You were chosen by the National Television Company of Ukraine to represent them at Eurovision in 2004 .
#Text=How were you approached by them ?
#Text=Was it a hard decision for you to decide whether or not to accept their offer ?
#Text=Obviously it was very successful for you , but before the fact , did you ever consider not performing ?
#Text=I can say that before I went to Eurovision there were a lot of talks – [ people saying it 's ] good or bad .
#Text=I just did not listen to anyone ; [ I ] just trusted my instincts .
#Text=Your performance is one of the best-remembered in history .
#Text=Did it ever tire you to hear yourself compared to " Xena " from the television show " Xena : Warrior Princess " ?
#Text=Are you okay with that being your primary aesthetic attribute to foreign audiences ?
#Text=For me [ a ] real Amazon is not [ a ] " Warrior Princess . "
#Text=It 's [ a ] beautiful , smart , independent woman .
#Text=She knows what she definitely wants and she gets it .
#Text=Lana [ Editor 's note : Ruslana 's alter-ego , an " Amazon , " in her album Wild Energy ] dreams about love .

column1: #Text=Magic feelings that give us inspiration and wings .
#Text=The main idea of [ the ] Wild Energy show is to show the character of [ an ] Amazon .
#Text=She can be [ a ] girl [ with ] wind , girl [ with ] fire , girl [ with ] water , girl [ with ] rock .
#Text=She 's [ a ] girl [ made of the ] elements , but she fell in love and became vulnerable .
#Text=She does n't know what to do , how to live with those feelings .
#Text=Ruslana performing on Germany 's national public TV channel Das Erste .
#Text=German viewers voted her song " Wild Dances " the best song in Eurovision history .

#Text=German public television held a contest a few years ago and the public voted " Wild Dances " the best Eurovision song in history , ahead of well-established standards like " Waterloo " and " Ein bißchen Frieden " .
#Text=Do you feel your song is the best in the history of the entire Contest ?
#Text=It was a great honor for me .
#Text=I was so happy to hear it . [ There were ] a lot of beautiful talented singers and great songs [ in all the ] years [ the competition has been in existence ] .
#Text=I like original songs with deep meaning and of course interesting shows .
#Text=Wild Energy
#Text=The Wild Energy concept is tied to a science fiction novel .
#Text=How did the idea come about that you would take the sentiment expressed in that novel and make music with it ?
#Text=How do you personally relate with the messages conveyed in the novel and in your music ?
#Text=What does " the energy for living " mean to you ?
